text: Ndipo mzimu wolemedwa sungathe kunyamula katundu wa mzimu wina wolemedwa ndipo ngati mzimu wina wolemedwa utalilira mzimu wina wolemedwa kuti uunyamulire katundu wake, winawo siungathe kunyamula katunduyo ngakhale kuti mizimuyo itakhala pa chibale. Achenjeze okhawo amene amaopa Ambuye wawo mwamseri ndipo amakwaniritsa mapemphero, ndipo aliyense amene adziyeretsa, amatero populumutsa mzimu wake. Ndi kwa Mulungu kokha kumene onse adzabwerera
